xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 08 May 2014
xwikidoc.content: <akats> has joined #phenotips 13:03 <mcupak> has quit 13:08 <akats> For this issue, what is the latest dataset? I've been able to find only 2006/2007, but then the issue doesn't make sense because that's the one you would've used. https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues/652 13:14 <sdumitriu1> akats: Checking 13:14 <sdumitriu1> Let this one for later 13:45 <vijay13> has quit 13:58 <akats> ok 14:23 <akats> I'm working on this issue now https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues/823. What I noticed was that in the administration, in the rights section, the check mark for "unregiestered - view" needs to be removed. How much of an issue is it? 14:24 <akats> Otherwise, even if the page has all rights denied to the all group and xwiki:XWiki.Guest, I can still view the page if I'm not registered 14:36 <akats> actually nevermind 14:37 <akats> so if a document became an absolute orphan, what do you want to happen? 14:38 <akats> should it be transferred under the Admins wing? 14:38 <akats> or deleted? 16:03 <akats> so I just changed the for loop like you suggested 16:04 <akats> now I'm somehow below the 0.66 coverage (0.65) 16:04 <akats> should I write tests? 16:04 <sdumitriu> Hm... 16:04 <sdumitriu> In theory yes 16:04 <sdumitriu> But I'll forgive you this time if you don't feel like it 16:05 <akats> aww shucks, really up to you. I need to practice my tests, but the issues might be more important. So if they're not, I'll write some tests 16:06 <sdumitriu> Are there any tests for that listener already? 16:07 <sdumitriu> Yes there are 16:07 <sdumitriu> One 16:07 <sdumitriu> So yeah, you should write a new test 16:07 <akats> ok 16:10 <akats> is there any way to test private functions without reflection 16:10 <sdumitriu> Not really 16:10 <sdumitriu> But you shouldn't test private methods... 16:10 <sdumitriu> Except that testing code that deals with oldcore is hard 16:12 <akats> I'll figure it out :) 16:18 <akats> has quit 17:16 <allasm> has quit 17:17 <sdumitriu> has quit 17:53 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips
